name: Glacial Vest
tooltip:
Glacial VestLevel 60

Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 8 Frozen Runes, 8 Bolts of Runecloth, 6 Essences of Water, 4 Ironweb Spider Silks and 300 gold. You must also be of Exalted reputation with the Argent Dawn.

Requirements:
- Frozen Rune x 8
- Bolt of Runecloth x 8
- Essence of Water x 6
- Ironweb Spider Silk x 4
- Argent Dawn:
- Money:300
